Entries.Leah_Games: The art in some of those games is quite beautiful, don't you think?#$e#I enjoy seeing Abby play, but I'm not very good at it myself.

Entries.Abigail_Games: Come on Leah! This time we'll defeat him!$5

Entries.Fri2: It seems that Olivia have a nice book collections.#$e#I wonder if she would show me.
Entries.Sun4: For me beauty only exists in the mind. Words, thoughts, and music are enough for me.$h#$e#What about you @?
Entries.summer_Fri2: Life around the valley is so peaceful, I really enjoy it.
Entries.spring_15: I hope you are faring well this spring @.

Entries.Introduction: Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.#$e#It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields with Leah.$9
Entries.Mon4: I'm getting an urge to visit the lake...#$b#...but it's only at its best when it's raining.
Entries.Wed4: My favorite class? media arts is fun...#$b#Don't know what I'd do with that for a career, though.#$b#Maybe Leah can give me some pointers.
Entries.Thu2: Sebastian, Sam and I used to be good friends. But we kind of grew apart when we grew up.$6
Entries.Fri2: I'll be going to the saloon with Leah this evening. It's kind of like a Friday tradition, I guess.
Entries.Fri4: It's saloon night. Wanna join us this evening?#$e#I think would like for you to be there too.
Entries.summer_Mon8: I used to think Pelican Town was kinda drab, but with Leah and you, I'm starting to love being here.$h
Entries.summer_Fri2: Leah's a few years older than I am, but I feel like I can truly be me around her.#$e#I wonder if that's what having a sister feels like.
Entries.summer_Sat10: This might be the best summer of my life.$l#$e#But getting to spend time with you and Leah in the fall sounds even better.$l
Entries.fall_Wed8: I wonder if they'll let me design some of the features in the Spirit's Eve maze someday.#$e#I've got some ideas, I'll ask Leah to sketch them for me.
Entries.fall_Thu4: Leah's one of the few people who actually gets me.#$e#Well, you sort of do, too.$h
Entries.fall_Thu10: I had an interesting dream last night, with Leah and you in it.#$e#It was a good dream.$h
Entries.fall_Fri10: I used to feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.$l#$e#@, what are your plans for the future?
Entries.winter_Sat6: My favorite class? media arts is fun...#$b#Don't know what I'd do with that for a career, though.#$b#Maybe Leah can give me some pointers.
Entries.winter_Sat10: Thanks for not getting weirded out after the bit with the spirit board.$l#$e#I was seriously worried that you'd never talk to me again.$l
Entries.fall_Tue2: Leah's basically my best friend.#$e#We have been so close since she moved to the valley.
Entries.Thu6: I picked up how to play the drums pretty easily as a kid. My own set is in storage, though.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: #$c .5#I think I'll bust out my good ol' sketchbook today and paint something with Leah. I've got some ideas for mythical beasts that could be fun.#The dark... the rain... it gets me excited.$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey, remember when we played that duet by the lake? This weather reminds me of that day.#$e#$c .5#Do you still carry around that mini harp? That one kind of surprised me. Where'd you learn to play, anyway?#You really surprised me with that mini-harp... I never expected that. I guess that's why I like you so much.$l

Entries.Fri4: Abby goes to the saloon with Leah on Friday nights. Maybe you could join them?
Entries.Tue4: Jodi and I have been close friends for a number of years now.#$b#I'm glad Abby have someone like that too. Leah is like an older sister for her.

Entries.Tue2: I was wondering for a while whether someone would move into that farm. Abigail and I went there from time to time.#$b#But it's nice that you moved in!
Entries.Tue6: I made a little painting for Abby to hang in her bedroom. #$b#She likes unusual things, but I like that about her too.
Entries.Wed2: You got along with Abigail, right?#$b#Maybe we could all hang out at the next festival.
Entries.summer_Sun4: Life around the valley blooms in summer, is nice to see it.#$e#Of course, it's always nice to see you, too.
Entries.fall_Sat4: Heyyy! So what do you think of my fall decorations?$h#$e#You should have some Spirit's Eve decorations for your farm. Abby and I can help you with it!
Entries.winter_Thu4: I hope Abby is doing ok. Yesterday, she had a pretty serious discussion with her parents...$2

Entries.spring_25: Some people say that beauty is experienced in the mind. They think that words most resemble our thoughts and are best for creating beauty.#$e#But... don't we also think in images? And aren't image-based thoughts usually more potent?#$b#...I dunno. What do you think?$u
Entries.summer_12: Yesterday festival was so nice. I love the sense of community in the valley.
Entries.winter_4: Hmm... I wonder how Linus is doing with all this cold in that little tent? Do you think maybe he'd appreciate a hot meal from us?

Entries.Abigail: Leah should try competing, it's fun!

Entries.Leah: Hey @. Don't mind us. We were just preparing for the dance.

Entries.Elliott: I didn't forget about the luau this year!$h#$e#Well, Willy reminded me, anyway. That helped.

Entries.Leah_spouse: Abby always get so motivated for this festival.#$b#It's nice seeing her so excited. I hope she never loses that childish side of her.

Entries.Leah: The wood statues? Yeah, I made them.#$b#Do you like them @?

Entries.Leah_spouse: Hey. We're paying our respects to another bygone summer. We'll come meet up with you when we launch the candle-boat.
Entries.Leah: Hey. We're paying our respects to another bygone summer.

Entries.Elliott: Gus was just telling me about his artisan candy canes. *yawn*$u#$e#I think he had too much cinnamon nog.
Entries.Caroline: Leah seems to be a good influence on Abby, I'm glad they're friends.

Entries.set-up: christmasTheme/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Christmas/loadActors Set-Up/warp Demetrius -400 -400 true/warp Leah 25 65 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/positionOffset Leah -3 -20 true/positionOffset Abigail 0 -10 true/playerControl christmas

Entries.45382947/f Leah 250 Abigail 250/w sunny/: none/-500 -500/farmer 38 14 3 Abigail 34 25 2 Leah 34 22 2/skippable/animate Abigail false true 500 53/animate Leah false true 250 32 33 34/pause 850/playMusic jaunty/pause 1000/viewport 34 14 true/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 8/viewport move 0 3 3800/pause 1300/speak Abigail "Can you draw some cool aquatic monster trying to catch me?"/animate Leah false true 250 35/speak Leah "Not exactly my style, but I can try."/speak Abigail "Oh oh! and put some big sword at my side too.#$b#The monster thinks that I'm distracted... and then he attacks!#$b#Next moment! Bam! I cut him into a million pieces!"/speak Leah "But-$2"/speak Abigail "Wait wait! Make it five monsters! and add some flying ones too!$1"/pause 50/emote Leah 28/end

Entries.50/f Leah 500/p Leah: breezy/9 8/farmer -50 -50 0 Leah 3 7 3 Abigail 3 6 2/skippable/animate Leah false true 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 16/pause 100/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/textAbovehead Abigail "Yeah, he's pretty nice."/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/warp farmer 7 9/playSound woodyStep/playSound doorClose/pause 300/stopAnimation Leah/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 1 true/faceDirection Abigail 1 true/emote Leah 16 true/emote Abigail 16/speak Abigail "Oh, hey @."/speak Leah "Hi @! Come in, come in."/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Leah 1/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 500/speak Leah "I'm just working on this sculpture here."/speak Abigail "And I'm distracting her, as usual."/faceDirection Leah 0/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Leah "Don't be silly Abby. You know that I enjoy having you here while I work."/pause 150/emote Abigail 32/pause 100/faceDirection Leah 1/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 300/speak Leah "Come here @. Watch this."/pause 300/faceDirection Abigail 3/move Abigail -1 0 2/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0 3/move farmer -1 0 2/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/animate Leah false true 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 16/pause 100/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 600/stopAnimation Leah/showFrame Leah 19/speak Leah "See that? I'm revealing the essence of the wood."/pause 500/showFrame Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "$q -1 null#Once you get past the outer layers, the true nature starts to show...#$r -1 0 event_sculpt1#It's the same with people.#$r -1 0 event_sculpt2#I actually prefer the look of raw, unadultered wood."/fork creepySexualPass/pause 1500/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Abigail "Just curious Leah, why did you decided on this valley for your artistic dream?"/speak Leah "I first visited it as a little girl, while on vacation with my parents.#$b#I knew I had to come back some day... This place has great artistic potential!"/speak Abigail "Yeah, it really does.#$b#The feel of the rain while you're amidst nature. It's like being in a different world."/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "I have to admit though... It's not easy to pay the bills as an artist.$s"/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Leah 0/question fork1 "#Why don't you have an art show in town?#Why don't you sell your art on the internet?"/fork internet/faceDirection Leah 0/faceDirection Abigail 1/speak Abigail "Hey, that's a great idea!"/speak Leah "Hmmm... I guess that could set the wheels in motion to making Pelican Town a true art destination...$7"/faceDirection Leah 3/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 700/speak Leah "But what if no one likes my sculptures? I'd be crushed.$s"/speak Abigail "What? That's nonsense Leah! Your art is great, I'm sure everyone would love it."/pause 500/speak Leah "I'm not so sure about that... but I'll think about it.$s"/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 200/speak Abigail "Well, I should be going. My father might need some help at the store."/question fork1 " #Yeah, I should be going too."/speak Leah "Ok. Thanks for stopping by you two, I really appreciate your support."/speak Abigail "Anytime. See you later Leah."/textAbovehead Leah "Bye!"/pause 600/move farmer 4 0 2 true/pause 50/move Abigail 4 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/addMailReceived LeahArtShowSuggestion/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "An art show for the whole village? That's a bold idea, @."
Entries.internet: speak Leah "Hmm... I guess that's an idea... But I'd need a computer first.$7"/speak Abigail "I could help you choosing one."/addMailReceived LeahInternet/faceDirection Leah 3/emote Leah 28/pause 500/speak Leah "But again... that's expensive.$s"/speak Abigail "We can buy the parts separately. It's cheaper that way."/pause 500/speak Leah "Ok. I'll think about it.$s"/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 200/speak Abigail "Well, I should be going. My father might need some help at the store."/question fork1 " #Yeah, I should be going too."/speak Leah "Ok. Thanks for stopping by you two, I really appreciate your support."/speak Abigail "Anytime. See you later Leah."/textAbovehead Leah "Bye!"/pause 600/move farmer 4 0 2 true/pause 50/move Abigail 4 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/addMailReceived LeahArtShowSuggestion/end warpOut

Entries.51/f Leah 1000/p Leah: sadpiano/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Leah 13 8 0/skippable/showFrame Leah 20/changeMapTile Front 14 7 1453/viewport 12 8/move farmer 0 -1 1/speak Leah "Kelly... How many times do I have to tell you? I don't want to come back to the city!$8#$b#Stop calling me... I don't want to hear from you anymore! *click*$8"/playSound openBox/faceDirection Leah 1/changeMapTile Front 14 7 1454/emote Leah 12/pause 1000/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "@...$6"/pause 300/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "So I guess you heard me yelling on the phone?$s"/faceDirection Leah 2/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1000/playMusic desolate/speak Leah "That was my ex...$s"/faceDirection Leah 3/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Leah "I guess I'd better tell you a little about it...$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 500/speak Leah "We had an apartment together, back in the city.$u#$b#I did odd jobs during the day and spent all night working on art projects... we barely made enough to scrape by.$u#$b#She was always nagging me to go back to school and study business or medicine... something with a lot of money in it.^She was always nagging me to go back to school and study business or medicine... something with a lot of money in it.$a#$b#I guess the idea was to save up for a normal life. You know... a house in the suburbs, adopting a kid, PTA meetings... that sort of thing.$u"/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "I wasn't ready for that kind of life, @... I had to leave. So I came here to pursue my dream of being an artist."/pause 900/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "$q 83 null#Was that selfish of me, @?$s#$r 83 0 event_parents1#No. Abandoning one's dreams doesn't lead to happiness.#$r 83 0 event_parents2#No, and your ex sounds like an idiot.#$r 83 -20 event_parents3#No, but you would've been better off staying in the city.#$r 83 -20 event_parents4#Yeah, a little.#$r 83 -20 event_parents5#Yeah, but it's natural to care about yourself first."/faceDirection Leah 3/fork angry/pause 200/fork LeahInternet internet2/fork LeahArtShowSuggestion artShowSuggest/speak Leah "Well, thanks for listening to me. It's good to have a friend."/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "Hey, thanks for listening to me so patiently earlier."
Entries.angry: emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "Sorry... I shouldn't get angry.$s"/emote Leah 40/speak Leah "Maybe you're right... my life would've been a lot easier if I had stayed.$u#$b#Maybe it's better to be practical and realistic... for all I know my art career will never pan out and I'll live my final years in squalor.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/speak Leah "Well, thanks for listening to me. It's good to have a friend."/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.internet2: pause 50/speak Leah "So I've been saving up money to buy a computer... You know, so I can try and sell my art online like you suggested."/emote farmer 32/speak Leah "It's good to have some friends looking out for you!"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.artShowSuggest: pause 50/speak Leah "Anyway... I've been thinking a little more about that art show idea you had.#$b#I'm working on some new sculptures to display at the show... I'm nervous, but the thought of getting my work out there is pretty exciting.#$b#I'm just glad you and Abby are on board with making Stardew Valley a premier art destination!$h"/pause 500/end warpOut

Hi.$2"/emote Abigail 8/speak Abigail "Is something wrong? You seem down.$6"/playMusic desolate/speak Leah "Well, yeah...$2#$b#My parents called me today... Kelly, my ex, went to see them.$2"/speak Abigail "What for?$3"/speak Leah "...So they may convince me to return back to the city.$2"/speak Abigail "And they agreed to that?$3"/speak Leah "Yeah...$2"/speak Abigail ".....$5"/question fork1 " #What are you going to do?"/speak Leah "Nothing... I'll remain at the valley. It's just that I didn't expected this from my parents...$2#$b#I was hoping for them to understand how important this is to me...$2"/speak Abigail "They are your parents, they should believe in you...$3#$b#But if they don't, we will, and we'll help you in any way we can! Right @?!$3"/question fork1 " #Of course. Anything you need Leah."/speak Leah "*Smile*#$b#Thanks you two, just being there is enough for me."/emote Leah 20/pause 200/emote Abigail 32 true/emote farmer 32/end
